verses.verse: <S%H6662>Righteous<s%> are you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H7378>plead<s%> with you: <S%H389>yet<s%> let me <S%H1696>talk<s%> with you of your <S%H4941>judgments:<s%> <S%H4069>Why<s%> does the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6743>prosper?<s%> why are <S%H3605>all<s%> they <S%H7951>happy<s%> that deal <S%H899>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously?<s%>

You have <S%H5193>planted<s%> them, <S%H1571>yes,<s%> they have taken <S%H8327>root:<s%> they <S%H3212>grow,<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> they <S%H6213>bring<s%> <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H6529>fruit:<s%> you are <S%H7138>near<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H7350>far<s%> from their <S%H3629>reins.<s%>

But you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> me: you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> me, and <S%H974>tried<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H854>toward<s%> you: <S%H5423>pull<s%> them out like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for the <S%H2873>slaughter,<s%> and <S%H6942>prepare<s%> them for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2028>slaughter.<s%>

<S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourn,<s%> and the <S%H6212>herbs<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H3001>wither,<s%> for the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein? the <S%H929>beasts<s%> are <S%H5595>consumed,<s%> and the <S%H5775>birds;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> He shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> our <S%H319>last<s%> end.

<S%H3588>If<s%> you have <S%H7323>run<s%> with the <S%H7273>footmen,<s%> and they have <S%H3811>wearied<s%> you, then <S%H349>how<s%> can you <S%H8474>contend<s%> with <S%H5483>horses?<s%> and if in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> wherein you <S%H982>trusted,<s%> they wearied you, then <S%H349>how<s%> will you <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H1347>swelling<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan?<s%>

For <S%H1571>even<s%> your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> they have dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with you; <S%H1571>yes,<s%> they have <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H4392>multitude<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you: <S%H539>believe<s%> them not, <S%H3588>though<s%> they <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2896>fair<s%> words to you.

I have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> my <S%H1004>house,<s%> I have <S%H5203>left<s%> my <S%H5159>heritage;<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the dearly <S%H3033>beloved<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%> into the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of her <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

My <S%H5159>heritage<s%> is to me as a <S%H738>lion<s%> in the <S%H3293>forest;<s%> it <S%H5414>cries<s%> <S%H6963><s%> out <S%H5921>against<s%> me: <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> have I <S%H8130>hated<s%> it.

My <S%H5159>heritage<s%> is to me as a <S%H6641>speckled<s%> <S%H5861>bird,<s%> the <S%H5861>birds<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about are <S%H5921>against<s%> her; <S%H3212>come<s%> you, <S%H622>assemble<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H857>come<s%> to <S%H402>devour.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H7462>pastors<s%> have <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> my <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> they have <S%H947>trodden<s%> my <S%H2513>portion<s%> under <S%H947>foot,<s%> they have <S%H5414>made<s%> my <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H2513>portion<s%> a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

They have <S%H7760>made<s%> it <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> and being <S%H8077>desolate<s%> it <S%H56>mourns<s%> to me; the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> is made <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7760>lays<s%> it to <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

The <S%H7703>spoilers<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8205>high<s%> places through the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> from the one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> even to the other <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall have <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

They have <S%H2232>sown<s%> <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> but shall <S%H7114>reap<s%> <S%H6975>thorns:<s%> they have put themselves to <S%H2470>pain,<s%> but shall not <S%H3276>profit:<s%> and they shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of your <S%H8393>revenues<s%> because of the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> that <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have caused my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5428>pluck<s%> them out of their <S%H127>land,<s%> and <S%H5428>pluck<s%> out the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H310>after<s%> that I have <S%H5428>plucked<s%> them out I will <S%H7725>return,<s%> and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on them, and will <S%H7725>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>again,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5159>heritage,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H518>if<s%> they will diligently <S%H3925>learn<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by my <S%H8034>name,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives;<s%> as they <S%H3925>taught<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H1168>Baal;<s%> then shall they be <S%H1129>built<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>
But <S%H518>if<s%> they will not <S%H8085>obey,<s%> I will utterly <S%H5428>pluck<s%> up and <S%H6>destroy<s%> that <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
